channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bessent will interview 11 candidates to replace Powell at Fed
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said Tuesday he plans to interview nearly a dozen "very strong" candidates to replace Jerome Powell as chair of the F...

item.title: Media Insist Mail Voting Is Secure Days After MI Councilman Investigated For Stuffing Ballot Boxes

item.title: Drop Box Camera Catches Ballot Stuffing In Fraud-Plagued Michigan Town
item.description: Ballot dumps are suspicious. Election law requires ballots be dropped off by the voter, a member of the voter’s family, the voter's household

item.title: The Economic Consequences of Donald Trump
item.description: America’s highly compromised public finances require that it do everything to promote economic growth to help manage the debt burden.

item.title: China opposing Trump's Golden Dome missile defense
item.description: China is working against President Trump's Golden Dome plan for a nationwide strategic missile defense system covering the United States as destabiliz...

item.title: Don’t Blame Mail-In Voting
item.description: Instead, make it a priority to take advantage of it, since it’s not going anywhere.

item.title: Virginia governor's race tightens between Democrat Spanberger, Republican Earle-Sears
item.description: Democrat Abigail Spanberger's lead over Republican Winsome Earle-Sears has narrowed as the two gubernatorial candidates prepare for the post-Labor Day...

item.title: Trump Ending Wars Is Wonderful, But Only One Thing Can Get Him Into Heaven
item.description: Trump may have been joking, but it bears repeating: None of your own works, not even saving lives, can earn you a spot in paradise.

item.title: Trump Has No Power to Tell States How to Conduct Elections
item.description: While Congress may override state election regulations, the president has no such power.

item.title: Presidents Don’t Run Our Elections
item.description: Donald Trump shouldn’t imitate Joe Biden’s effort to federalize elections.

item.title: Obama Presidential Center sparks backlash from Chicagoans
item.description: Many Chicago residents are unhappy with the Obama Presidential Center, saying it's causing the area to be gentrified and pricing out locals.

item.title: Georgia Republicans, against backdrop of 2026 election, push to eliminate state income tax

item.title: The Coming Japanification of Economies
item.description: The dramatic aging of many countries’ populations will present immense economic, political, and social challenges. Market-oriented reforms can help.

item.title: West Texas Measles Outbreak Ends, Foiling Media’s Efforts To Make It The Next Pandemic
